com.sonf.nio

类 NioChannelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonf.core.AbstractIOController<S>

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IOController<NioSession>

    public class NioChannelController
extends AbstractPollingIoController<NioSession,java.nio.channels.SocketChannel>
    NIO TCP socket Channel Controller Inheriting class of AbstractPollingIoController.

      • buildSession

        public IOSession buildSession(java.lang.String host,
                              java.lang.Integer port)

      • buildSession

        protected NioSession buildSession(java.lang.String host,
                                  java.lang.Integer port,
                                  AbstractIOConfig config)
        build a IOSession connected to specified host:port
        指定者:
        buildSession 在类中 AbstractPollingIoController<NioSession,java.nio.channels.SocketChannel>
        参数:
        host - the host domain of remote endpoint this session will connect to lately.
        port - the port on which the remote endpoint listened for connections.
        config - session's configuration which used only by this session. Modification to this configuration will effect on the session immediately.
        返回:
        An IOSession instance.

      • newSession

        参数:

      • connect

        protected boolean connect(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel,
                          java.net.SocketAddress remoteAddress)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Connect a newly created client socket channel to a remote address. This operation is non-blocking,
        指定者:
        connect 在类中 AbstractPollingIoController<NioSession,java.nio.channels.SocketChannel>
        参数:
        channel - the client socket channel
        remoteAddress - the remote address where to connect
        返回:
        true if a connection was established immediately, false if the connection operation is in progress
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If the connect failed

      • finishConnect

        protected boolean finishConnect(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Finish the connection of a client socket after it was reported to be ready by the AbstractPollingIoController.select(int) call.
        指定者:
        finishConnect 在类中 AbstractPollingIoController<NioSession,java.nio.channels.SocketChannel>
        参数:
        channel - the client socket channel to finish the connection
        返回:
        true if the socket is connected, false if connection failed.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

                           throws java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException

      • select

        protected int select(int timeout)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Check for connected sockets, interrupt when at least one connection is processed (connected or failed to connect). Use AbstractPollingIoController.selectedChannel() to get all the client socket processed.
        指定者:
        select 在类中 AbstractPollingIoController<NioSession,java.nio.channels.SocketChannel>
        参数:
        timeout - The timeout for the select
        返回:
        The number of processed socket
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception thrown by the underlying systems calls

        protected void wakeup()
        Interrupt the AbstractPollingIoController.select(int timeout) method. Used when the polled sessions queue changed
        指定者:

      • selectedChannel

        protected java.util.Iterator<java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel> selectedChannel()
        Iterator for the set of sockets with connection processed. during the last AbstractPollingIoController.select(int timeout) call.
        指定者:
        selectedChannel 在类中 AbstractPollingIoController<NioSession,java.nio.channels.SocketChannel>
        返回:
        the list of processed sockets channels
